pullrequest.title: Change gazebo rendering Heightmap class to compile with Ogre 1.11/1.12

content.raw:
Changes looks reasonable to me.

I imported the changes into of the gazebo10 branch:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2630)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2630/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2630/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=36)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/36/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/36/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1791)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-homebrew-amd64/1791/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1791/))



I don’t see any new failure or regression. Thanks Silvio!

‌
content.html:
Changes looks reasonable to me.

I imported the changes into of the gazebo10 branch:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2630/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/36/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1791/)

I don’t see any new failure or regression. Thanks Silvio!
